episode: I celebrated my birthday recently.  None of my friends remembered it was my birthday.  I spent my birthday alone.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I celebrated my birthday recently.  None of my friends remembered.  I spent my birthday alone.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: I'm really sorry to hear that. It's tough when friends forget something important.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Thank you.  I always remember my friends birthday.  I always try to send them well-wishes or meet up with them.  It makes me feel that I am not valued by my friends.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's really disappointing. You deserve better, and itâ€™s okay to feel hurt.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I do feel hurt.  This made me think that I can only depend on myself in this life.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: I understand. It's tough, but remember some people do care and value you.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: It's hard for me to find the people who care about me.  But, I know they are out there.  I just have to keep on moving forward.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Absolutely, keep going! Your kindness will attract the right people.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Sometimes, I wish I wasn't so kind.  I feel it sets me up to get hurt.  But, I think it is best to kind without expecting anything in return.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Kindness is your strength, not a weakness. Keep being you.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: One good thing about my birthday is that I ordered some takeout from a restaurant that I loved.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's awesome! A great meal can lift your spirits.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I don't typically eat out very often so it was a treat.  It was a seafood restaurant.  I splurged on my meal since I don't do it often.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Sounds delightful! Treats make moments special.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: The popcorn shrimp helped to lift my spirits up a little.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Glad it cheered you up!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I tried to rationalize that my friends were busy with their own lives.  I know their world doesn't revolve around me.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's understanding of you. Life gets hectic sometimes.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I know that I will find people in the future who will be there for me during my special moments.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Indeed. Keep believing in that.
